ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: The authors would first like to thank the Mediterranean Institute for Nature and Anthropos for financially and factually supporting this study as part of their project “Terra Lemnia.” They would especially like to thank Mrs. Ivi Nanopoulou, Mr. George Dimitropoulos, and Mrs. Danae Sfakianou. Also a great thank you to all the people of Lemnos island that opened their homes and shared their time, kindness, and knowledge.
